name: Astral World Tree Illumistil
text:
3+ Effect Monsters
You can only control 1 "Astral World Tree Illumistil". Each time your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) face-up during the Main Phase, you gain LP equal to its ATK. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can pay LP in multiples of 1000 (max. 3000); this card gains an equal amount of ATK.
